comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Wallace Morgan (1873-1948), illustrator for Harper's Bazaar, Bookman, and quite a number of books.

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content:
pennylrichardsca: Thanks for the additional information. Wallace Morgan was indeed quite a prolific illustrator. Highlights include illustrating for the New York Herald newspaper for many years as well as working as an artist for the U.S. Army during World War I.  

We will add more details to the source data and reload the description to Flickr.
